bitcoinHeader: Bitcoin: A New Revolution in the Digital Gold Era!
bitcoinDescription: Bitcoin is the digital currency transforming the financial world. With its growing popularity, it is shaping the economic structure of the future.
tourismHeader: The Latest Developments in the World of Tourism!
tourismDescription: Discover the latest travel news, emerging trends, and must-visit destinations from around the world!

locationPermissionDescription: We need your location to personalize the news for you.
notificationPermissionDescription: We want to send you notifications so you don't miss important news.
cameraPermissionDescription: Camera access is needed to take photos.
galleryPermissionDescription: We need access to your media files to upload photos.
microphonePermissionDescription: Microphone access is needed for voice commands or recordings.
storagePermissionDescription: Read/write permission is needed for proper app functionality.
permissionDeniedForever: Permission has been permanently denied. Please enable it manually from settings.

warningShared: The news could not be shared. Please try again later.
titleShare: Share this news with your friends.
logOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
notifications_question: How can I turn off notifications?
notifications_answer: Go to the Settings page, enter the 'Notifications' section, and turn off the related option.
bookmarks_question: Where are my saved news articles?
bookmarks_answer: From the bottom menu, go to the 'Saved' tab to access all the news articles you have saved.
darkmode_question: How can I enable dark mode?
darkmode_answer: Go to Settings > Theme and enable the 'Dark Mode' option.
offline_answer: You can read saved news without an internet connection. However, new news requires internet access.
share_question: How can I share news articles?
share_answer: On the news detail page, tap the share button to share the news via social media or messaging apps.
userNotFound: No user found with this email.
invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already associated with another account.
operationNotAllowed: This sign-in method is not allowed.
tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
networkRequestFailed: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
invalidCredential: The email or password is incorrect.
